static void stackTrace (String msg)

Detailed Description

An abstraction of logging. This is provided as an abstract class rather than an interface because a number of useful methods are provided here; and life would be more complicated with pure interfaces.

Version:
Id
LogHandler.java,v 1.4 2005/01/30 15:13:39 ilyad Exp

static void com::xacct::CRANE::collector::LogHandler::stackTrace (  String  msg  )  [inline, static]
 

For debugging when we don't have an interactive debugger; this can be called anywhere to give information about where we are.

Parameters:
msg Message to output with the stack trace. 
00199                                               {
00200         Exception e = new Exception(msg);
00201         System.err.println("Forcing stack trace: " + msg);
00202         stackTrace(e);
00203     }

static void com::xacct::CRANE::collector::LogHandler::stackTrace (  Throwable  e  )  [inline, static]
 

Print a stack trace on stderr.

Parameters:
e The exceptions, whose stack trace is to be output. 
00189                                                {
00190         e.printStackTrace(System.err);
